Text:
function ERU_EP05_15()
    -- .転-1【3月第1週】「最後の姫選挙」
    SaveData.Title = "最後の姫選挙"

    -- //BG：メインストリート
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I went to Yuriai Private Academy with Akira, and the first thing I felt was a sense of discomfort.]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav",0)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2353.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Surprised "Huh? There are a lot of people I don't know?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1142.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal "Aren't they students from the middle school or sister schools? I thought visitors were allowed to watch the Princess Election?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1143.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal "That's why I'm able to come to school with my head held high today."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2354.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Surprised "Y-Yeah, that's true."]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2355.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Surprised "But I feel like there are not only unfamiliar uniforms, but also a lot of adults here."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1144.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Surprised "Eh? Y-Yeah, you're right. I see some men in suits too."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Seeing those unusual people on the main street, I sensed that discomfort. A faint anxiety and a restless feeling in my chest.]])

    MSG([[ Soon I would come to realize that this was not just my imagination.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：大講堂正面（スポットライト無し）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ ――Thirty minutes remain until the start of the Princess Election. Suddenly, on the day of the event, new information and rules were announced, and we hurriedly gathered in the auditorium.]])

    -- //BU：アキラ（焦り）、リラ（苦笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1145.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Flustered "Ugh... There are even more people here than at the school festival."]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0582.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile "I can't believe they announced the outside guests at the last minute like this. That's ruthless."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0583.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "Apparently, the invited guests are people from companies affiliated with the Himegami family. No doubt they're under their influence."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1146.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Sad "That means... the votes from the outside guests are hopeless."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（真剣）、ウラン（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0515.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Serious "They're even doing a live broadcast online and accepting online votes!? This is a first in Yuriai Private Academy's history!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0984.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran】Sad "Votes from outside will overwhelmingly favor the well-known Hermes-sama. Announcing such terms on the day itself is despicable."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ As everyone has been discussing, the announced information and rules are as follows. They invited many spectators from outside school, and votes from these guests and online viewers will be accepted.]])

    MSG([[ All these points clearly give an advantage to the famous Hermes-san.]])

    MSG([[ One could even feel a desperate will to win this Princess Election at any cost.]])

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0456.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "My grandfather instructed me to support the Himegami family as well. It seems they hold a great deal of influence in the industry."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0457.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "I laughed it off, though! Hahaha!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0129.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "That applies to us too. No matter how close our families are to the Himegamis, we won't allow interference!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0096.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Normal "Indeed. Our bonds of the heart are stronger than blood ties!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0138.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #3】Normal "I've never liked that Nemesia bastard... We'll show her. Hehehe."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2356.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Smiling "Thank you all."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The boys’ club members clearly declared their support, giving me courage.]])

    MSG([[ There was no point in panicking now. All we could do was put everything into what we could do.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2357.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Even if the situation is unfavorable, we have to do it. Please lend me your strength!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ ――Ten minutes remain until the Princess Election begins. We gathered backstage out of the audience's view and started our final strategy meeting.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2358.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Normal "It's finally happening."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：アキラ（通常）、リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0584.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "So then, shall we quickly review the stage presentation? Everyone’s been so busy we hardly had a proper meeting."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0585.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wink "Akira, chief strategist, please.<r=オナシャース>"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1147.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Flustered "Why me...!? Lira-pon, you're treating me more and more carelessly!?"]])

    MSG([[ Akira pouted in dissatisfaction, but began speaking with practiced ease.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1148.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal "As you all know, the theme for this appeal is 'Freedom.'"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1149.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal "Without a doubt, Hermes will appeal with her specialty, singing and dancing, and will probably take over 90% of the audience's favor."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0586.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile "You sound so sure! There's no chance of winning at that rate."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2359.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Smiling "But you have a good strategy, right?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1150.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smiling "Yes, I have a countermeasure ready for the internet users."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1151.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smiling "Just in case something like this happened, I introduced this election on my channel beforehand. I also just posted the voting URL on Twitter."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1152.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Grinning "To think someone would use the power of the internet against the genius gamer AKIRA... that's beyond arrogant."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（興奮）、アキラ（ニヤリ）、ウラン（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ma")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0516.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Excited "As expected of Akira Onee-sama...!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0985.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran】Normal "Votes from outside guests make up 20% of the total, and votes from Van Dyne viewers correspond to about 10%."]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san probably confused online with Van Dyne, but since this was a serious conversation, I didn’t correct her and let it pass.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0986.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran】Sad "We’ll leave the Van Dyne votes to Akira-san’s strategy, but for the outside guests, we have no choice but to give up."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2360.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "So the outcome depends on how much of the remaining 70% support we can gather."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Even if we won a majority of that, it would be just over 35%, less than half.]])

    MSG([[ To have a majority of all votes, we’d need to win over more than 70% of all Yuriai Private Academy students.]])

    MSG([[ I must achieve a decisive victory within the school to become the nation’s idol and the academy's greatest 'Princess.']])

    STOP_BGM("1000")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("orge_0459_1.0.2.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Don’t worry, Erika. No matter how strong the opponent is, you can definitely win."]])

    PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("orge_0460_1.0.2.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "I can say with confidence that Erika is the supreme Yamato Nadeshiko... as a friend who has shared joys and hardships with you."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0460.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "Even my beautiful muscles say so! Hahaha!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0130.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Excited "We believe in you too, Erika!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0040.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Excited "Our fate is with you, Erika!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0139.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #3】Excited "We were just perverts before... but thanks to Erika, we changed. Next, we’ll change the academy and the Himegami family."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（笑顔）、リラ（通常）、ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0517.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Smiling "I really think I'm so glad I met you, Erika Onee-sama!"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0518.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Sad "Please... *sniff*... definitely win... Win and keep being my Onee-sama from now on..."]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1453_1.0.2.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "To be honest, from the moment you talked about Hermes-senpai, I kind of guessed Erika’s secret. But I won’t pry."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ia")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1454_1.0.2.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wink "Because, no matter what secret you hide, you’re still Ikusa Erika to me. Don’t lose to anyone but me, weed<sprite="Emoji" name="note">."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0987.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran】Normal "Erika-san, we have seriously opposed each other before. Even now, I believe the wall between sexes is not easily broken."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0988.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran】Smiling "But if anyone can... Erika-san can break it down. Please shatter the wall of discord that has arisen within Yuriai Private Academy with your own hands."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0025.wav")
    MSG([[ 【????】 "Whew! Just made it!"]])
    -- //桜島麗華

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2361.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Surprised "E-Everyone. You came?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×MAX
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB10aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ From behind the stage, the 'knights' who have supported me from the beginning appeared.]])

PLAY_VOICE("kyohka_0039.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Kyouka Himekaido】 "If it’s to support Erika Onee-sama, I would go through fire, water, or even a flower field."]])

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0026.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Reika Sakurajima】 "It was tough moving with so many of us, haha."]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0050.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Sakuya Yurikawa】 "Do your best, Princess Erika. We’re all watching from the audience."]])

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0044.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Izune Heiwado】 "I’ll properly play the part of a cheering crowd from the audience~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0041.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Jasuko Heiwado】 "It’s important to stir up the neutral crowd too, oh ho ho ho.<sprite="Emoji" name="note">"]])

PLAY_VOICE("meme_0019.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Meme Tsudanuma】 "Erika Onee-sama... please come back to us again."]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0055.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Yuri Ryuguuin】 "No matter how it ends, no matter what circumstances or secrets you carry, we will continue to adore Erika Onee-sama."]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0036")
    MSG([[ 【Knights】 "Do your best, Erika Onee-sama."]])

    MSG([[ Each knight gave me words of encouragement.]])

    MSG([[ Not just Akira, the 'Princesses,' and the boys’ club. Now I am supported by so many people.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2362.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Tearing smile "Thank you, everyone."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ This past year, so many things have happened. It was full of troubles; worries never ended, and I cried more than once or twice in pain.]])

    MSG([[ But now, supported by many people, I’m about to stand on a brilliant stage.]])

    -- //CG：アルメリア誕生
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV040aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ A long time ago, I had two older sisters.]])

    MSG([[ I was always the one being protected.]])

    MSG([[ I wanted to become strong enough one day to protect them and catch up to them.]])

    MSG([[ Now, I want to be manly enough to take their hands and lead them onward.]])

    MSG([[ And today I face the most beautiful girl in Yuriai Private Academy who has defeated one sister and swallowed the other.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：アキラ（通常）、マリカ（通常）、ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1153.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal "There’s not much to say now, so just one thing."]])

    -- //SE：抱き着く音
PLAY_SE("SEa024.wav")
WAIT(600)

    MSG([[ Akira hugged me tightly and whispered with a smile.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1154.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smiling "This is the wish I finally found for you. Make sure to make it come true."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2363.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Smiling "Thank you, Akira. I will definitely... make it come true."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0751.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Smiling "...Please take care of my little sisters. They're a handful."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2364.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Wry smile "Yes, leave it to me. I will definitely lead Hermes and Almeria back to you, Daria."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Marika-nee tried to reach out to my head but stopped halfway.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0090.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Marika】Smiling "Sis can’t protect Mina-chan anymore."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01da")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0091.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Marika】Sad "Mina-chan, please... save my precious friends."]])

    MSG([[ I took her hand tightly and made a vow.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2365.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Leave it to me. I will definitely save Almeria and the others."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //SE：ブザー音
PLAY_SE("SEb024.wav")
WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ The buzzer announcing the start of the Princess Election sounded.]])

    MSG([[ Finally, the last battle begins.]])

STOP_SE("SEb024.wav",1000)
    -- //BU：無し
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Surrounded by everyone’s watchful eyes, I stepped to the center of the stage.]])

    -- //SE：黄色い歓声
--PLAY_SE("SEf007.wav")

    MSG([[ Walking forward while being showered with familiar cheers, I faced my competitor――]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・エルメス）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa001ah")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0557.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Smiling, Final Boss "Ufufu<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Today I will deliver the cutest ever to everyone～～～～～<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">"]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0558.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hermes】Wink, Final Boss "Let’s clash with our full cuteness! ‘Battle Princess’ Ikusa Erika-chan!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2366.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】 "No, I don't intend to compete with you. I’m standing here today for very personal reasons."]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2367.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】 "To help you, Almeria."]])

    MSG([[ And so, the Princess Election began.]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    STOP_ALL_SE(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_16")
end
